thread.title: 22 Pictures That Will Give You Flashbacks To Elementary School Recess
thread.title_full: 22 Pictures That Will Give You Flashbacks To Elementary School Recess

author: Dave Stopera
title: 22 Pictures That Will Give You Flashbacks To Elementary School Recess
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @jg32era “CHERRYBOMB!”
ID: 10674436 2. The ultimate in digging technology: View this image › 
pinterest.com ID: 10674500 3. That magical rhyme: View this image › 
Twitter: @_RhythmNBlues “YOU’RE IT!”
ID: 10674472 4. The sure-fire way to puke up everything you just ate: View this image › 
reddit.com Just looking at it makes me sick.
ID: 10674526 5. That one slide that would burn the hell out of you on hot days: View this image › 
reddit.com It burns.
ID: 10679885 6. The world’s most beautiful playground: View this image › 
cleveland.com ID: 10674512 7. I can still feel the splinters: View this image › 
kidsgroveplayground.com ID: 10674536 8. So many wasps nests. View this image › 
imgur.com ID: 10679396 9. That sweet, smelly mulch that you fell into way too many times: View this image › 
Twitter: @UpYourCas ID: 10674434 10. That one bridge you’d just stand on either side of and jump up and down on: View this image › 
rebrn.com ID: 10674507 11. The alpha and the omega of swings… TIRE: View this image › 
Getty / cveltri ID: 10679392 12. Writing as fast as you could to get to recess… View this image › 
Twitter: @bbydreaaa ID: 10674454 13. Only to find out it was raining outside and it was time to play this game during indoor recess: View this image › 
pinterest.com ID: 10679564 14. Or mess with these for a while inside: View this image › 
qualityclassrooms.com ID: 10679580 15. All those weird metal structures shaped like bugs: View this image › 
springsidenow.wordpress.com Why???
ID: 10679628 16. The cards that were basically currency on the playground: View this image › 
pokeorder.com ID: 10681562 17. The most versatile ball out there: View this image › 
fourthgradenothing.com Kickball, dodgeball, you name it. I can still smell it.
ID: 10679509 18. Those sweet parachute games: View this image › 
Twitter: @Howdy_Simmer ID: 10674481 19. Those X’s and O’s no one played: View this image › 
soucatequista.com.br ID: 10679542 20. That one kid who was always doing this with his eyes: View this image › 
Twitter: @comedypics Every day.
ID: 10682123 21. That big ol’ mess of tangled metal: View this image › 
pinterest.com And falling off the top straight down to the mulch:
ID: 10679898 22. And, of course, tag. Just remember… View this image ›
